class_notes: (THIS CLASS IS FULL; contact candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list) (ONLINE: fully ASYNCHRONOUS)
course_description: This course provides an introduction to the teachings and meditative practices of Zen Buddhism, addressing issues of particular interest and concern to Christians and giving special attention to comparisons between Zen thought and Christian theology.
